cells.data:
1) _What is the point of Marquis?_
    > There are thousands of Walmart stores that will eventually run their own Kubernetes cluster on premise. Orchestration and lifecycle management for those clusters is required for a successful outcome. Marquis is meant for that.
2) Do we use a network overlay with our Kubernetes deployments?
    > Yes. We use [Calico](https://www.projectcalico.org/). Kubernetes has a default built-in overlay, but we don't use it. Flannel is another option.
3) Is Kubernetes edge-triggered or level-triggered?
    > Kubernetes is **level-triggered**. See [this article](https://hackernoon.com/level-triggering-and-reconciliation-in-kubernetes-1f17fe30333d) for more information.
